subject: How can I automatize a mouse click ?
msgSnippet: Hi, I have an unit of code which show a message when any error happens. Then the user needs to click ok to make the message disapears. I d like to automatize
messageBody:
Hi,

I have an unit of code which show a message when any error happens.

Then the user needs to click ok to make the message disapears.

I'd like to automatize the click, so the user doesn't need to be there when JUnit is testing my application.

Is there anyway to do that ?

Can someone help me ?

Thanks.

Wmiro.

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
